author: heikki.ruhanen
title: DID market study & deployment
description: Lack of understanding in DID solutions and validity of credentials in Latin America.
solution: Conducting a market study in Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro for DID based recruitment in the fields of banking, finance and insurance
experience: Fairway (Company behind the submission) are creating the service already in Ethiopia and integrating Atala PRISM technology to our software.
